verses.text_uthmani: الٓمٓ

translations.text: Alif-Lãm-Mĩm.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Alif-lam-meem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: تَنزِيلُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ لَا رَيْبَ فِيهِ مِن رَّبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

translations.text: The revelation of this Book is—beyond doubt—from the Lord of all worlds.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Tanzeelu alkitabi la raybafeehi min rabbi alAAalameen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ ٱفْتَرَىٰهُ ۚ بَلْ هُوَ ٱلْحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكَ لِتُنذِرَ قَوْمًا مَّآ أَتَىٰهُم مِّن نَّذِيرٍ مِّن قَبْلِكَ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَهْتَدُونَ

translations.text: Or do they say, “He has fabricated it!”? No! It is the truth from your Lord in order for you to warn a people to whom no warner has come before you, so they may be ˹rightly˺ guided.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Am yaqooloona iftarahu bal huwa alhaqqumin rabbika litunthira qawman ma atahum minnatheerin min qablika laAAallahum yahtadoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا فِى سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍ ثُمَّ ٱسْتَوَىٰ عَلَى ٱلْعَرْشِ ۖ مَا لَكُم مِّن دُونِهِۦ مِن وَلِىٍّ وَلَا شَفِيعٍ ۚ أَفَلَا تَتَذَكَّرُونَ

translations.text: It is Allah Who has created the heavens and the earth and everything in between in six Days,<sup foot_note=77171>1</sup> then established Himself on the Throne. You have no protector or intercessor besides Him. Will you not then be mindful?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Allahu allathee khalaqa assamawatiwal-arda wama baynahuma fee sittatiayyamin thumma istawa AAala alAAarshi malakum min doonihi min waliyyin wala shafeeAAin afalatatathakkaroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يُدَبِّرُ ٱلْأَمْرَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ إِلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ ثُمَّ يَعْرُجُ إِلَيْهِ فِى يَوْمٍ كَانَ مِقْدَارُهُۥٓ أَلْفَ سَنَةٍ مِّمَّا تَعُدُّونَ

translations.text: He conducts every affair from the heavens to the earth, then it all ascends to Him on a Day whose length is a thousand years by your counting.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yudabbiru al-amra mina assama-iila al-ardi thumma yaAAruju ilayhi fee yawmin kanamiqdaruhu alfa sanatin mimma taAAuddoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ذَٰلِكَ عَـٰلِمُ ٱلْغَيْبِ وَٱلشَّهَـٰدَةِ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

translations.text: That is the Knower of the seen and unseen—the Almighty, Most Merciful,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thalika AAalimu alghaybi washshahadatialAAazeezu arraheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱلَّذِىٓ أَحْسَنَ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ خَلَقَهُۥ ۖ وَبَدَأَ خَلْقَ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنِ مِن طِينٍ

translations.text: Who has perfected everything He created. And He originated the creation of humankind from clay.<sup foot_note=77172>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Allathee ahsana kulla shay-inkhalaqahu wabadaa khalqa al-insani min teen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ثُمَّ جَعَلَ نَسْلَهُۥ مِن سُلَـٰلَةٍ مِّن مَّآءٍ مَّهِينٍ

translations.text: Then He made his descendants from an extract of a humble fluid,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thumma jaAAala naslahu min sulalatinmin ma-in maheen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ثُمَّ سَوَّىٰهُ وَنَفَخَ فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِهِۦ ۖ وَجَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمْعَ وَٱلْأَبْصَـٰرَ وَٱلْأَفْـِٔدَةَ ۚ قَلِيلًا مَّا تَشْكُرُونَ

translations.text: then He fashioned them and had a spirit of His Own ˹creation˺ breathed into them. And He gave you hearing, sight, and intellect. ˹Yet˺ you hardly give any thanks.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thumma sawwahu wanafakha feehi min roohihiwajaAAala lakumu assamAAa wal-absara wal-af-idataqaleelan ma tashkuroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَقَالُوٓا۟ أَءِذَا ضَلَلْنَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ أَءِنَّا لَفِى خَلْقٍ جَدِيدٍۭ ۚ بَلْ هُم بِلِقَآءِ رَبِّهِمْ كَـٰفِرُونَ

translations.text: ˹Still˺ they ask ˹mockingly˺, “When we are disintegrated into the earth, will we really be raised as a new creation?” In fact, they are in denial of the meeting with their Lord.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waqaloo a-itha dalalnafee al-ardi a-inna lafee khalqin jadeedin bal humbiliqa-i rabbihim kafiroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ قُلْ يَتَوَفَّىٰكُم مَّلَكُ ٱلْمَوْتِ ٱلَّذِى وُكِّلَ بِكُمْ ثُمَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُمْ تُرْجَعُونَ

translations.text: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Your soul will be taken by the Angel of Death, who is in charge of you. Then to your Lord you will ˹all˺ be returned.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qul yatawaffakum malaku almawti allatheewukkila bikum thumma ila rabbikum turjaAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَوْ تَرَىٰٓ إِذِ ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ نَاكِسُوا۟ رُءُوسِهِمْ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ رَبَّنَآ أَبْصَرْنَا وَسَمِعْنَا فَٱرْجِعْنَا نَعْمَلْ صَـٰلِحًا إِنَّا مُوقِنُونَ

translations.text: If only you could see the wicked hanging their heads ˹in shame˺ before their Lord, ˹crying:˺ “Our Lord! We have now seen and heard, so send us back and we will do good. We truly have sure faith ˹now˺!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaw tara ithi almujrimoona nakisooruoosihim AAinda rabbihim rabbana absarnawasamiAAna faarjiAAna naAAmal salihaninna mooqinoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَوْ شِئْنَا لَـَٔاتَيْنَا كُلَّ نَفْسٍ هُدَىٰهَا وَلَـٰكِنْ حَقَّ ٱلْقَوْلُ مِنِّى لَأَمْلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنَ ٱلْجِنَّةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ أَجْمَعِينَ

translations.text: Had We willed, We could have easily imposed guidance on every soul. But My Word will come to pass: I will surely fill up Hell with jinn and humans all together.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaw shi-na laataynakulla nafsin hudaha walakin haqqaalqawlu minnee laamlaanna jahannama mina aljinnati wannasiajmaAAeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَذُوقُوا۟ بِمَا نَسِيتُمْ لِقَآءَ يَوْمِكُمْ هَـٰذَآ إِنَّا نَسِينَـٰكُمْ ۖ وَذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابَ ٱلْخُلْدِ بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ

translations.text: So taste ˹the punishment˺ for neglecting the meeting of this Day of yours. We ˹too˺ will certainly neglect you. And taste the torment of eternity for what you used to do!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fathooqoo bima naseetum liqaayawmikum hatha inna naseenakum wathooqooAAathaba alkhuldi bima kuntum taAAmaloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّمَا يُؤْمِنُ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ذُكِّرُوا۟ بِهَا خَرُّوا۟ سُجَّدًا وَسَبَّحُوا۟ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّهِمْ وَهُمْ لَا يَسْتَكْبِرُونَ ۩

translations.text: The only ˹true˺ believers in Our revelation are those who—when it is recited to them—fall into prostration and glorify the praises of their Lord and are not too proud.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Innama yu/minu bi-ayatinaallatheena itha thukkiroo bihakharroo sujjadan wasabbahoo bihamdi rabbihim wahumla yastakbiroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: تَتَجَافَىٰ جُنُوبُهُمْ عَنِ ٱلْمَضَاجِعِ يَدْعُونَ رَبَّهُمْ خَوْفًا وَطَمَعًا وَمِمَّا رَزَقْنَـٰهُمْ يُنفِقُونَ

translations.text: They abandon their beds, invoking their Lord with hope and fear, and donate from what We have provided for them.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Tatajafa junoobuhum AAani almadajiAAiyadAAoona rabbahum khawfan watamaAAan wamimmarazaqnahum yunfiqoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَا تَعْلَمُ نَفْسٌ مَّآ أُخْفِىَ لَهُم مِّن قُرَّةِ أَعْيُنٍ جَزَآءًۢ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ

translations.text: No soul can imagine what delights are kept in store for them as a reward for what they used to do.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fala taAAlamu nafsun maokhfiya lahum min qurrati aAAyunin jazaan bima kanooyaAAmaloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَفَمَن كَانَ مُؤْمِنًا كَمَن كَانَ فَاسِقًا ۚ لَّا يَسْتَوُۥنَ

translations.text: Is the one who is a believer equal ˹before Allah˺ to the one who is rebellious? They are not equal!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Afaman kana mu/minan kaman kanafasiqan la yastawoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ فَلَهُمْ جَنَّـٰتُ ٱلْمَأْوَىٰ نُزُلًۢا بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ

translations.text: As for those who believe and do good, they will have the Gardens of ˹Eternal˺ Residence—as an accommodation for what they used to do.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Amma allatheena amanoowaAAamiloo assalihati falahum jannatualma/wa nuzulan bima kanoo yaAAmaloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ فَسَقُوا۟ فَمَأْوَىٰهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ ۖ كُلَّمَآ أَرَادُوٓا۟ أَن يَخْرُجُوا۟ مِنْهَآ أُعِيدُوا۟ فِيهَا وَقِيلَ لَهُمْ ذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابَ ٱلنَّارِ ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ

translations.text: But as for those who are rebellious, the Fire will be their home. Whenever they try to escape from it, they will be forced back into it, and will be told, “Taste the Fire’s torment, which you used to deny.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waamma allatheena fasaqoofama/wahumu annaru kullama aradooan yakhrujoo minha oAAeedoo feeha waqeela lahum thooqooAAathaba annari allathee kuntum bihitukaththiboon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَنُذِيقَنَّهُم مِّنَ ٱلْعَذَابِ ٱلْأَدْنَىٰ دُونَ ٱلْعَذَابِ ٱلْأَكْبَرِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَرْجِعُونَ

translation.text: And surely, We will let them taste

translations.text: We will certainly make them taste some of the minor torment ˹in this life˺ before the major torment ˹of the Hereafter˺, so perhaps they will return ˹to the Right Path˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walanutheeqannahum mina alAAathabial-adna doona alAAathabi al-akbari laAAallahumyarjiAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَنْ أَظْلَمُ مِمَّن ذُكِّرَ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِۦ ثُمَّ أَعْرَضَ عَنْهَآ ۚ إِنَّا مِنَ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ مُنتَقِمُونَ

translations.text: And who does more wrong than the one who is reminded of Allah’s revelations then turns away from them? We will surely inflict punishment upon the wicked.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waman athlamu mimman thukkirabi-ayati rabbihi thumma aAArada AAanhainna mina almujrimeena muntaqimoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا مُوسَى ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ فَلَا تَكُن فِى مِرْيَةٍ مِّن لِّقَآئِهِۦ ۖ وَجَعَلْنَـٰهُ هُدًى لِّبَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ

translations.text: Indeed, We gave the Scripture to Moses—so let there be no doubt ˹O Prophet˺ that you ˹too˺ are receiving revelations—<sup foot_note=77173>1</sup>and We made it a guide for the Children of Israel.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad atayna moosaalkitaba fala takun fee miryatin min liqa-ihiwajaAAalnahu hudan libanee isra-eel
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَجَعَلْنَا مِنْهُمْ أَئِمَّةً يَهْدُونَ بِأَمْرِنَا لَمَّا صَبَرُوا۟ ۖ وَكَانُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا يُوقِنُونَ

translations.text: We raised from among them leaders,<sup foot_note=77174>1</sup> guiding by Our command, when they patiently endured and firmly believed in Our signs.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WajaAAalna minhum a-immatan yahdoonabi-amrina lamma sabaroo wakanoo bi-ayatinayooqinoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ يَفْصِلُ بَيْنَهُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ فِيمَا كَانُوا۟ فِيهِ يَخْتَلِفُونَ

translations.text: Indeed, your Lord will decide between them on the Day of Judgment regarding their differences.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna rabbaka huwa yafsilu baynahumyawma alqiyamati feema kanoo feehiyakhtalifoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَوَلَمْ يَهْدِ لَهُمْ كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا مِن قَبْلِهِم مِّنَ ٱلْقُرُونِ يَمْشُونَ فِى مَسَـٰكِنِهِمْ ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ ۖ أَفَلَا يَسْمَعُونَ

translations.text: Is it not yet clear to them how many peoples We destroyed before them, whose ruins they still pass by? Surely in this are signs. Will they not then listen?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Awa lam yahdi lahum kam ahlakna minqablihim mina alqurooni yamshoona fee masakinihim inna feethalika laayatin afala yasmaAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ أَنَّا نَسُوقُ ٱلْمَآءَ إِلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ ٱلْجُرُزِ فَنُخْرِجُ بِهِۦ زَرْعًا تَأْكُلُ مِنْهُ أَنْعَـٰمُهُمْ وَأَنفُسُهُمْ ۖ أَفَلَا يُبْصِرُونَ

translations.text: Do they not see how We drive rain to parched land, producing ˹various˺ crops from which they and their cattle eat? Will they not then see?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Awa lam yaraw anna nasooqu almaaila al-ardi aljuruzi fanukhriju bihi zarAAanta-kulu minhu anAAamuhum waanfusuhum afala yubsiroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَـٰذَا ٱلْفَتْحُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ

translations.text: They ask ˹mockingly˺, “When is this ˹Day of final˺ Decision, if what you say is true?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wayaqooloona mata hatha alfathuin kuntum sadiqeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ يَوْمَ ٱلْفَتْحِ لَا يَنفَعُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ إِيمَـٰنُهُمْ وَلَا هُمْ يُنظَرُونَ

translations.text: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “On the Day of Decision it will not benefit the disbelievers to believe then, nor will they be delayed ˹from punishment˺.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qul yawma alfathi la yanfaAAuallatheena kafaroo eemanuhum wala hum yuntharoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَأَعْرِضْ عَنْهُمْ وَٱنتَظِرْ إِنَّهُم مُّنتَظِرُونَ

translations.text: So turn away from them, and wait! They too are waiting.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: FaaAArid AAanhum wantathirinnahum muntathiroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration
